transcript:
Customer: Shiv Shambhu Shiv Shambhu Shiv Shambhu Bhole.
Halo?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Hello. Ya hi sir, very good afternoon. Kaise hain?
Customer: Theek hai boliye.
Executive: Hi ji. Sir us time aapne mujhe call kiya tha aur jisme aapka by lead wala option like just open ki thi dekhne ke liye ki aap kis type ki by lead ko like consume kar rahe hain. Okay sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main dekh rahi thi just ki aap experience like karne ke liye like aap kaise type ki by lead ko consume kar rahe hain jisse client ka respond aisa aa raha hai.
Customer: Nahi mere ko ek minute ek ghante baad mein call karna. Aapne by lead aaj maine purchase ki hai usme sabhi ko call kariye aap. Number toh show kar raha hoga na aapko.
Executive: Saari cheeze mujhe show kar rahi hain. But number show kar rahi hai unko unke na call call karke aaj review lijiye humse ek baar baat kariye woh kya bol rahe hain. Sir sir sir sir sun lijiye. Main aapko just yehi cha rahi hu ki main mere ko na aapka data nahi show hota.
Customer: Theek hai? Bas mujhe ye dikh raha hai ki is person se aapne by lead consume ki hai like dekho aaj aapne. Chalo main unko main unko main unka number bhej raha hu pehle aap baat kariye unse. Unko requirement hai ya nahi.
Executive: Sir aapne jo by lead consume ki hai woh kal ki by lead posted thi. 12 tarikh ki by lead posted thi aapne aaj consume kari hai 24 ghante ho chuke hain sir.
So obviously sir aapke alawa char clients ne aur connect kar liya hoga aur IndiaMART sirf business aapko teen tarike se provide karta hai na sir. By lead inquiry and call. Inquiry ka kya follow up hai? Main main bol raha hu customer ka yehi tha ki hum sir check kar rahe the sirf.
Customer: Theek hai. Woh check karne wali by lead nahi banti kabhi bhi.
Executive: Sir unhone dala hua hai. Agar main main main koi Google pe jaake koi product search kar raha hu. Aur IndiaMART utha ke usko buyer ko forward kar deta hai woh inquiry. Sir. Toh usme customer kya bolega usme?
Executive: Sir sir sir. Ek second main aapko kuch bolna chahungi aapse. Dekhiye sir IndiaMART tab by lead post karta hai aap bhi sir agar as a buyer agar aap IndiaMART jayenge. Toh waha par sir agar aap kuch bhi post karne jaoge toh waha par aapki us product se related teen char question bhi pucha jata hai na. Aap jab tak sir woh saari cheez fill nahi karoge aapka like inquiry kaise post hota hai sir? Requirement toh puchi jaati hai woh samne se iska matlab woh aisa like hai. Toh usme IndiaMART kya kar sakta hai sir unhone inquiry toh raise ki hai tabhi toh IndiaMART kiya hai na ye. Sir pehle woh first time hota hai first time hota hai first time hota hai.
Customer: Kya first time hota hai? Agar IndiaMART ki site ke andar jayenge ek baar hi hota hai woh.
Executive: Sir ye toh hota hai.
Customer: Uske baad mein dobara nahi mangta woh. Aur aap aur suniye. Chalo ek ghante baad mein call karna mere ko aap. Sure sure sure sure. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to call buylead customers.
- Customer says checking does not become buylead.
- Customer says IndiaMART forwards irrelevant inquiries.


Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead posting process.
- Executive said customer consumed old buyleads.


Next Steps: 

- Customer asked the executive to call after one hour.


Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, customer experience, follow up
